p: Indeed, aqueous and hydromethanolic stem barks and leaves’ extracts showed lower antiviral activity towards picornaviruses compared to HCoV 229E at the tested concentrations. Certainly, hydromethanolic leaves’ extracts showed the best antiviral activity against enveloped viruses, especially the M. alba var. alba extract, which completely eliminated the HCoV 229E infection ( Figure 2). M. alba var. rosea stem barks’ hydromethanolic extract was also the most active against HCoV 229E.
